titleStmt.title: A three-fold resolution, verie necessarie to saluation Describing earths vanitie. Hels horror. Heauens felicitie. By Iohn Denison Batchelour in Diuinitie.
titleStmt.author: Denison, John, d. 1629.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Field for Iohn Norton,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
